configuration.title: Installed Status
configuration.description: Tells if the module is installed or not

configuration.title: Enable Inventory Center Shipping
configuration.description: Do you want to offer inventory center shipping?

configuration.title: Tax Class
configuration.description: Use the following tax class on the shipping fee.

configuration.title: Shipping Zone
configuration.description: If a zone is selected, only enable this shipping method for that zone.

configuration.title: Display Order
configuration.description: Display Order. Lowest is displayed first.

configuration.title: Pricing Method
configuration.description: Is the pricing to be figured per product or per order?
